Code Good: Don't treat signals as plain values.

Code Bad:
const [state, setState] = createStore({ user: { name: '' } });
setState('user', 'name', 'John');

Do: JSX compiles to direct DOM calls.
Build on signals not framework wrappers.
Components should be pure where possible.
Multiple signal sets batch into one update.

Don't: Use when items don't need identity.
